attributes.action: put pressure on the Isle of Wight Council and Southern Vectis to reduce bus fares.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since OAP's have been granted free travel on island busses, fares have been increased to an extortionate amount. The student rider system did reduce them to 50p, but this has seen a 100% rise to £1 recently. For adults there is a minimum fee of £2. To travel 1 mile on a bus for 4 adults costs £8, but a taxi costs £3.80. This must change if the government is serious about the threat of global warming and reducing emmisions it must act-NOW!!!
